home.restaurantDescription: Dedicated to life's simple pleasures of eating and drinking well, Roma is a nod to regional Italian home cooking by Chef Luca Pezzera, served in a grand yet inviting space in the heart of Jakarta's SCBD. Drop by for an al fresco lunch with the most authentic Neapolitan pizza in town, made by world champion pizzaiolo Pasqualino Barbasso. A leisurely dinner should involve at least one of our many iterations of Cacio e Pepe, the sublime spaghetti carbonara or the trippa all'omana, accompanied by fantastic Italian wines. The bar is perfect for a spot of aperitivo as well as late night revelries: try the excellent Garibaldi, any of the classic and innovative Negronis, or any cocktails highlighting amaro and bitters.

menu.title: MENU
menu.diningDescription: Our dining menu features a variety of Italian dishes, from classic pasta and risotto to seafood and meat options. We also offer a selection of vegetarian and vegan options.
menu.cocktailDescription: Our cocktail menu features a variety of classic and innovative cocktails, from classic martinis to modern craft cocktails. We also offer a selection of non-alcoholic options.
menu.wineDescription: Our wine menu features a variety of Italian wines, from classic red and white wines to sparkling wines and dessert wines. We also offer a selection of non-alcoholic options.

reservations.title: RESERVATIONS
reservations.name: Name:
reservations.privateDescription: Planning a special event? Contact us for private dining and event arrangements.
reservations.specialRequestsPlaceholder: Tell us about your event, special dietary requirements, decoration preferences, or any other details...
